name: sgtgigdilauncher-purhcaseapi
description: SgtGigdi API is a server that handles all purchase requests!

email.description: This determines whether you send emails after purchases or not (true or false)

ERROR_PAGE_URL.description: If your API has an error this will be the page that displays

giftcardsecret.description: Your gift card secret. In order for gift card purchases to work make sure this is the same as the secret env in the repl

MAINTENANCE_PAGE_URL.description: If your API has been set to maintenance this will be the page that displays

webhook.description: This determines whether you send webhooks after purchases or not (true or false)

purchasebotwebhookurl.description: The url of the webhook, purchase requests are sent to

justtoletyouknowwebhookurl.description: The url of the webhook, admin requests are sent to

gmailemail.description: The gmail email used for sending emails after purchases

gmailpass.description: The gmail password used for sending emails after purchases

giftcardticketwebhookurl.description: The url of the webhook, giftcard ticket request details are sent to

loginwebhookurl.description: The url of the webhook, giftcard ticket request details are sent to

giftcardtickethandlerurl.description: The url the requests are sent to for eval as well as making status page

confirmation.description: I confirm that my webhook my username and password for email and repl are all set up for this to work (true or false)
